Title: Assured Destruction
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Dan Nowak (written for television by), Hallie Lambert (staff writer)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: Earth strategizes a costly ploy to gain advantage in the war against Mars; Anna struggles to convince Sorrento-Gillis to do the right thing; Avasarala and Bobbie seek refuge aboard the Rocinante.
